DOC.criteria: Male female age 18 year old ; clinically confirm infection ; fulfil least two criterion systemic inflammatory response syndrome ( ) core temperature high 38 °C low 36 °C ( b ) respiratory rate 20/min , PCO2 32 mmHg ( c ) pulse rate 90/min , ( ) white blood cell count great 12,000/μl low < 4,000/μl less 10 % band . young 18 year age ; acquire immunodeficiency syndrome ; reduce polymorphonuclear granulocyte count ( < 500 μL1 ) ; die within 24h admission ICU , refuse participate study , decline treatment period observation .
